item.description:
Betsy had suggested this as an event that some of you might be interested in.
The details are as follows:

Costa del Sol Restaurant

IN CONJUNCTION WITH
Manchester Wine & Liquors


PRESENTS A Private
Paella and Wine Tasting

Walk around and enjoy up to
10 wines from Chile & Argentina
along with :
Jose Luis Lavin of Cono Sur Vineyards, Chile and
Edgardo Del Popolo, Winemaker of Dona Paula Vineyards, Argentina

Thursday, May 3, 2007 7:00 to 9:00 pm
$40.00 PER PERSON (all inclusive)



Betsy sent you this message from Greater Hartford Newly (+ a
bit longer) Single Meetup Group on Meetup.com:
----------------------------------------------------------------
Hi Everyone, as I have to buy the tickets by April 27th, please change
the listing to Yes or No only, NO MAYBE's. Event is cancelled
on 4/27/07 if there is no one besides me going. Thanks - Betsy
----------------------------------------------------------------


Tickets will be sold for this event
and can be purchased at Manchester Wine & Liquors
Due to limited seating and demand for this event,
there is a 4 ticket limit (I may be able to get up to 8
tickets, but will need to know soon so they are not sold
out))

Costa del Sol
is located at 901 Wethersfield Avenue
in the southend of Hartford

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Costa del Sol Rest for Wine Tasting,
